name: security-location_IMSI_SEGMENT_ATTR
alias: 公共安全-特定区域客流量常态化监控号码归属地分钟表
sql: select SECURITY_AREA,CITY_CODE,count(ROW) from SITEPOSITION group by SECURITY_AREA,CITY_CODE

name: tour-location_IMSI_SEGMENT_ATTR
alias: 景区-特定区域客流量常态化监控号码归属地分钟表
sql: select TOUR_AREA,CITY_CODE,count(ROW) from SITEPOSITION group by TOUR_AREA,CITY_CODE

name: security-location_registered_residence
alias: 公共安全-特定区域客流量常态化监控户籍地分钟表
sql: select SECURITY_AREA,PSPT_EPARCHY_ID,count(ROW) from SITEPOSITION group by SECURITY_AREA,PSPT_EPARCHY_ID

name: security-location_registered_residence_crowd_structure
alias: 公共安全-特定区域客流量常态化监控户籍地人群结构分钟表

name: security-location_area
alias: 公共安全-特定区域客流量常态化监控区域级分钟表
sql: select SECURITY_AREA,count(ROW) from SITEPOSITION group by SECURITY_AREA

name: tour-location_area
alias: 景区-特定区域客流量常态化监控区域级分钟表
sql: select TOUR_AREA,count(ROW) from SITEPOSITION group by TOUR_AREA

name: security-footfall_location_area
alias: 公共安全-客流量常态化监控热力图特定区域级分钟表
sql: select LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,SECURITY_AREA,count(ROW) from SITEPOSITION group by LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,SECURITY_AREA

name: tour-footfall_location_area
alias: 景区-客流量常态化监控热力图特定区域级分钟表
sql: select LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,TOUR_AREA,count(ROW) from SITEPOSITION group by LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,TOUR_AREA

name: tour-footfall_prefectural
alias: 景区-客流量常态化监控热力图地市级分钟表
sql: select LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,EPARCHY_ID,count(ROW) from SITEPOSITION group by LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,EPARCHY_ID

name: tour-footfall_province
alias: 景区-客流量常态化监控热力图全省分钟表
sql: select LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,count(ROW) from SITEPOSITION group by LONGITUDE,LATITUDE
